Articles.Content:
hopefully Spacesuits in new colors. Orange for the "Veterans" Jeb Bill and Bob, White for Astronauts and blue for recruit.

At the rate some of you people kill the poor little guys off, maybe the new recruits should have red shirts?

But blue is for the KAF... The Kerbal Air Force..

I like that. Ok than they should pick pink for the recruit. So that the other can make fun of them. :-P
I'll love the new SAS and ASAS. No more evil flips on your rovers and spacecrafts!

a new engine that can use all 8 cores and 16gb memory of my rig!

1000 parts builds ahoy!
for the love of monkeys I hope they return the magic boulder to its rightful place

At the rate some of you people kill the poor little guys off, maybe the new recruits should have red shirts?

That one made my day.

But I am looking forward to crew management. Big thing would be a ressource system, but that won't happen before 0.3, I guess.
Actually I would like to see Flags as Decals to put them on your rocket/spaceplane. I just remembered that it was a "promised" feature in 0.20, wasn't it?

I think it wasn't as much promised as it was said that the work on flags possibly opened up the possibility to do that. Some of the code used to pick custom flags can be applied to decals, but there's still the issue of plastering it on top of a usually round surface correctly. And on a place that is determined by the player rather than on a preset area on a flag. So that will still need some work to implement it obviously. It's a cosmetic feature I would love to see but it's not as important as flags were IMO. Flags at least mark stuff other than just look pretty.

Actually I would like to see Flags as Decals to put them on your rocket/spaceplane. I just remembered that it was a "promised" feature in 0.20, wasn't it?

It's already here, http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35225-Some-lesser-known-bits-of-info-for-addon-developers No mod makers have taken advantage of it yet that I have seen but nothing is stopping them.
Still waiting on resource gathering. I know Squad is focusing more on career mode right now and getting that up and running, but I really want to set up a mining base on the Mun without mods.
I hope the new ASAS will also fix the huge wobble in my spacestations

New ASAS?

What did I miss?

New ASAS?

What did I miss?

Chad (C7): IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been working on new SAS / ASAS behavior for the last week. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re aiming to reduce or eliminate the oscillations that happen in the current system. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re also removing the automatic torque from command pods and replacing it with a reaction wheel system. The new reaction wheels will actually require power to operate.

As far as I know this is all we know.
I'm looking forward to those reaction wheels

"No mod makers have taken advantage of it yet that I have seen but nothing is stopping them"

Do a search for KSF on spaceport. There are actually pretty bice looking plaques in there which are not pictured. id post a link but im on my phone.

Edited June 25, 2013 by kujuman

I am still waiting for Knova to post a teaser!

am wait, what happend to knova? I have not seen any post from him recently..

I am still waiting for Knova to post a teaser!

am wait, what happend to knova? I have not seen any post from him recently..

He's on leave for a while.

that was a fast response, ty for letting me know..

in that case, who will tease us now?
What's this Player Tracking thing?
Check it out, New SAS.

that was a fast response, ty for letting me know..

in that case, who will tease us now?

C7 I guess.
Really waiting for new SAS system and new spaceport scenery. I don't care if career mode is added slowly, because I love sandbox mode and they can take their time to make it nice.

Check it out, New SAS.

Holly Space Cow !!!

This just sounds perfect ! Nice work C7
Forget the scenery.. Gimme the SAS!!

What's this Player Tracking thing?

In campaign mode they are going to have goals that unlock as you go... like:

Get to orbit.

Orbit the Mun.

Land on the Mun.

In order for the goal Land on the Mun to unlock then the game has to have a way to know you achieved Orbit the Mun. That way for the game to know what you've done is the player tracking system.
